mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(b.num) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(a.member_uuid) num,a.member_uuid FROM ( SELECT member_uuid FROM order_item WHERE STATUS <>0 ) a GROUP BY a.member_uuid ) b WHERE b.num >1;
SELECT COUNT(a.uuid) AS num FROM(SELECT DISTINCT member_uuid UUID FROM order_item WHERE STATUS <> 0) a

SELECT COUNT(`uuid`) AS num,province_uuid AS province,`status`,create_date FROM orders GROUP BY province_uuid HAVING `status`= 0
and TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_date) <= 1
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 15 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
and PERIOD_DIFF( DATE_FORMAT( NOW( ) , '%Y%m' ) , DATE_FORMAT( create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) =1
and create_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND DATE_ADD(#{endDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY num DESC
